data.eml:eml: Micropezidae (Insecta, Diptera, Acalyptratae) of Madagascar and a revision of the genus Paramimegralla Hennig

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marshall, Stephen A. (2017): Micropezidae (Insecta, Diptera, Acalyptratae) of Madagascar and a revision of the genus Paramimegralla Hennig. Zootaxa 4290 (2): 244-280, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4290.2.2
